price: Na sema: Mola wangu Mlezi! Najikinga kwako na wasiwasi wa mashet'ani.
arabic: وَقُل رَّبِّ أَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنۡ هَمَزَٰتِ ٱلشَّيَٰطِينِ
footnotes: Nawe sema: Ewe Mola Mlezi! Najilinda kwako na wasiwasi wa mashetani wasiniingilie katika nafsi yangu kwa vitendo visio kupendeza.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: waqul rabbi aʿūdhu bika min hamazāti al-shayāṭīni
